name: Module Basics
description: Moodle activity module skeleton, version.php, lib.php, basic callbacks

name: Database Architecture
description: 8 tables (projetvet, form_cat, form_field, form_entry, form_data, field_data, thesis, mobility), EAV pattern implementation, relationships and indexes

name: Persistent Classes
description: 7 persistent classes (form_cat, form_field, form_entry, form_data, field_data, thesis, mobility) with validation and CRUD operations

name: Activities API
description: Central API layer: get_activity_structure(), get_entry(), get_activity_list(), create_or_update_entry(), caching strategy

name: JSON-Driven Form System
description: Dynamic form generation from JSON configuration, 3 categories (Informations générales, Acceptation, Compte rendu), 20 fields with metadata

name: Multi-Stage Workflow
description: Status progression (DRAFT→SUBMITTED→VALIDATED→COMPLETED), capability-based field access, automatic status increment

name: Custom TagSelect Element
description: Custom QuickForm element extending autocomplete, modal popup UI, search/filter, grouped options, badge display, freeze handling

name: Switch Element
description: Custom toggle switch form element (legacy, now using hidden field)

name: Dynamic Activity List
description: Configurable columns via listorder field (0=hidden, 1-N=order), dynamic table rendering, 7 default columns

name: Form Templates & UI
description: 6 Mustache templates (activity_list, student_list, student_info, tagselect_badge, form elements), responsive design

name: JavaScript/AJAX
description: 4 AMD modules (activity_entry_form.js, tagselect.js, student_info_forms.js, repository.js), modal dialogs, AJAX operations

name: Thesis Form
description: Simple form for thesis subject management

name: Mobility Form
description: Form for international mobility tracking (Erasmus, FMP)

name: JSON Import System
description: CLI script to import field structure from JSON, handles French text encoding, creates categories and fields

name: Testing & Bug Fixes
description: Frozen field data preservation, JSON encoding, form submission debugging, workflow testing

name: File Uploads
description: Add filemanager element support, file storage in Moodle file system, file serving callbacks, cleanup on delete

name: Competency Achievement Tracker
description: Custom element extending tagselect, achievement state tracking, date tracking, progress dashboard, visual indicators

name: Meeting Check-ins System
description: Complete check-in system reusing activity architecture (4 tables, persistent classes, API, forms, list view, workflow)

name: Graph Integration
description: Chart.js integration, aggregate queries (hours by category, credits by year, competency progress), caching, export

name: Status Navigation Widget
description: Visual progress indicator (stepper/progress bar), shows current stage, completed stages, who can act

name: Notifications System
description: Moodle message_send API, 5 notification types (submitted, approved, rejected, check-in required, check-in submitted), email templates, digest option

name: Backup and Restore
description: Complete backup/restore implementation for all 8 tables, user ID mapping, file handling, extensive testing

name: Privacy Provider
description: Full GDPR implementation (metadata provider, data export, data deletion), context handling, comprehensive testing

name: Unit Tests
description: Complete test suite covering persistent classes, API methods, forms, capabilities, events, 80%+ coverage

name: Behat Tests
description: Feature files for student/teacher/manager workflows, custom step definitions, accessibility testing

name: Code Cleanup & CI
description: Fix phpcs/phpmd/phpdoc violations, jshint/eslint fixes, security review, performance optimization, accessibility audit
